com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency

Class SPVirtualCurrencyConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency.SPVirtualCurrencyConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPVCSResultListener

    public class SPVirtualCurrencyConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPVCSResultListener

    Provides services to access SponsorPay's Virtual Currency Server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fetchDeltaOfCoins()
      Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user since the last time this method was called.
      void fetchDeltaOfCoinsForCurrentUserSinceTransactionId(java.lang.String transactionId)
      Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for the current user's transactions newer than the one whose ID is passed.
      static java.lang.String fetchLatestTransactionId(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String credentialsToken)
      Retrieves the saved latest transaction ID for a given user from the publisher state preferences file.

      Sets the custom currency name

      Sets a map of custom key/values to add to the parameters on the requests to the REST API.

      Indicates whether the toast notification should be shown after a successful query

    • Constructor Detail

      • SPVirtualCurrencyConnector

        public SPVirtualCurrencyConnector(android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String credentialsToken,
                          SPCurrencyServerListener currencyServerListener)
        Initializes a new instance with the provided context and application data.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        credentialsToken - The token identifying the SPCredentials to be used.
        currencyServerListener - SPCurrencyServerListener registered by the developer code to be notified of the result of requests to the Virtual Currency Server.

    • Method Detail

      • setCustomParameters

        public SPVirtualCurrencyConnector setCustomParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customParams)
        Sets a map of custom key/values to add to the parameters on the requests to the REST API.

      • setCurrency

        public SPVirtualCurrencyConnector setCurrency(java.lang.String currency)
        Sets the custom currency name
        Parameters:
        currency - the custom currency name
        Returns:

      • fetchDeltaOfCoins

        public void fetchDeltaOfCoins()
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user since the last time this method was called. The response will be delivered to one of the registered listener's callback methods.

      • fetchDeltaOfCoinsForCurrentUserSinceTransactionId

        public void fetchDeltaOfCoinsForCurrentUserSinceTransactionId(java.lang.String transactionId)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for the current user's transactions newer than the one whose ID is passed. The response will be delivered to one of the registered listener's callback methods.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The transaction ID used as excluded lower limit to calculate the delta of coins.

      • fetchLatestTransactionId

        public static java.lang.String fetchLatestTransactionId(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String credentialsToken)
        Retrieves the saved latest transaction ID for a given user from the publisher state preferences file.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        credentialsToken - credentials token id
        Returns:
        The retrieved transaction ID or null.

      • shouldShowToastNotification

        public static void shouldShowToastNotification(boolean showNotification)
        Indicates whether the toast notification should be shown after a successful query
        Parameters:
        showNotification -

      • onSPCurrencyServerResponseReceived

        public void onSPCurrencyServerResponseReceived(SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPCurrencyServerReponse response)
        Specified by:
        onSPCurrencyServerResponseReceived in interface SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPVCSResultListener
